summary: Provides a suite of automated tests that verify DreamBooth LoRA fine‑tuning on the SDXL model, covering basic training, checkpoint limits, custom caption handling, and text‑encoder integration.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the DreamBooth LoRA training pipeline for SDXL, ensuring reliable fine‑tuning, proper checkpoint management, and support for custom captions and text encoder configurations.
